articles.content: At 51, Ethan Hawke has lived many creative lives. “Dead Poet’s Society” made him a star at 18; at 24 he became a Gen X icon with “Reality Bites.” He was 25 when “Before Sunrise” kicked off the iconic… [+19450 chars]

articles.title: Steven Spielberg Shot a Music Video Using Just An iPhone - IGN - IGN

articles.content:

articles.title: Making ‘Aftershock,’ a Documentary About Black Maternal Mortality - The New York Times
articles.description: The directors Paula Eiselt and Tonya Lewis Lee discuss their journey in making the documentary “Aftershock,” which shines a light on a national health crisis.
articles.content: The film, streaming on Hulu, presents a litany of jarring facts for one, the explosion of cesarean births since the 1970s. The procedure, which is often more profitable for hospitals, results in sign… [+1049 chars]

articles.title: Dhanush on working with Russo Brothers in The Gray Man: 'Felt I had to deliver, so they come for more talent from India' - The Indian Express
articles.description: Dhanush plays a pivotal role in the upcoming Russo Brothers movie The Gray Man. He speaks to us about his first day on sets, his need to deliver as an actor in the film and collaborating with the Russos.
